properties.name: Veramin meteorite, Karand, Tehran Province, Iran
properties.description:
Veramin meteorite, Karand, Tehran Province, Iran

Type: 1

Location: Iran

Mesosiderite-B2 (stony iron) Fall, 18 Apr 1880; 54 kg The fall of the Veramin mesosiderite was accompanied by ten or so very loud explosions, smoke, and the almost immediate recovery of a pitted 54 kg stone. The stone soon came into the possession...
